name: Restable
description:
Overview:

Restable is a farm manager game... Or is it? Your whole farm is unstable, and it's your job to take back control of it!
Push your livestock into the stable as you comfort your dog so it doesn't hurt the other animals.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys - Move

Shift - Run

Spacebar - Interact

Credits: Art:
  • Yeramia
  • Karol Stefanowicz (RNDM)
Audio:

  • Kowara
Game design:
  • Francisco Roldan
  • Shad-
Programming:

  • Leonardo Blanco

    Made in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 49 game jam
